metadata.synopsis: This guard was part of the caravan that brought us to Moonrise. Looking around the tower ruins, unimpressed.

0.speaker: Bedi
0.text: Her cathedral will stand in the city, True Soul. On the bones of all Baldurians.
0.context: NodeContext: grave, taking himself too seriously

1.speaker: Bedi
1.text: Stink of dead gods and dust. This ruin is scarcely worthy of our Absolute.
1.context: NodeContext: snorting, derisive of Moonrise Towers
